annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The combination of global film, television and licensing efforts provides Hasbro with a foundation upon which we can expand our global consumers' immersive experiences with Hasbro brands.
annotations.translation: 全球电影、电视和授权工作的结合为孩之宝提供了一个基础，在此基础上，我们可以扩展全球消费者对孩之宝品牌的沉浸式体验。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Hasbro's heritage of playing right - for our customers, our environment, our communities and our employees - is embedded in our culture. We believe it will be the companies that recognize, systematically address and sustain strong corporate social responsibility (CSR) practices, and view such practices as a strategic imperative that will enjoy the greatest success today and well into the future.
annotations.translation: 孩之宝的传统——为我们的客户、我们的环境、我们的社区和我们的员工——植根于我们的文化中。我们相信，将是公司认可、系统地处理和维持强有力的企业社会责任（CSR）实践，并将此类实践视为当务之急，将在当今和未来取得最大的成功。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In 2011, we took great strides in our CSR efforts when we issued our first comprehensive CSR report. Hasbro has already begun to phase out PVC from some packaging, and has set a goal to completely eliminate PVC in new packaging produced by Hasbro beginning in 2013. Phasing out PVC in packaging is the most recent effort in a long series of sustainable packaging initiatives we have undertaken, all of which are designed to minimize the impact on our natural resources.
annotations.translation: 2011年，我们发布了第一份全面的企业社会责任报告，在企业社会责任方面取得了长足的进步。孩之宝已经开始从某些包装中逐步淘汰PVC ，并设定了从2013年开始在孩之宝生产的新包装中完全消除PVC的目标。逐步淘汰包装中的PVC是我们采取的一系列可持续包装举措中的最新举措，所有这些举措都是为了最大限度地减少对我们自然资源的影响。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Brian D. Goldner
annotations.translation: 布莱恩·D·戈德纳

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We are also honored to be the recent recipient of several prestigious recognitions, including being named on Ethisphere's 2012 "World's Most Ethical Companies" list; receiving the U.S. EPA's Climate Leadership Award for Excellence in Greenhouse Gas Management Goal Achievement; and for the second year in a row, being named on Fortune's 2012 "100 Best Companies to Work For" list.
annotations.translation: 我们还很荣幸最近获得了多项著名奖项，包括入选Ethisphere 2012年“全球最具商业道德企业”榜单；荣获美国环保署温室气体管理目标卓越成就气候领导奖；连续第二年入选《财富》2012年“100家最佳工作企业”榜单。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Importantly, in 2011, Hasbro contributed over $15 million in philanthropic support through the Hasbro Children's Fund and our Gift of Play product donation program to help make a difference for more than
annotations.translation: 重要的是，2011年，孩之宝通过孩之宝儿童基金和我们的Gift of Play产品捐赠计划捐赠了超过$1500万的慈善支持，以帮助实现超过

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Brian D. Goldner
annotations.translation: 布莱恩·D·戈德纳

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: President and Chief Executive Officer
annotations.translation: 总裁兼首席执行官

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: four million children worldwide. Our Team Hasbro employee volunteers also contributed over 18,000 hours to make a difference in our communities and we continue working to inspire young people to make their mark on the world through our founding support of generation On, the global youth service movement and youth enterprise of Points of Light. Our efforts in our communities are something Hasbro employees globally are proud to be a part of.
annotations.translation: 全球有四百万儿童。我们的孩之宝团队员工志愿者也贡献了超过 18,000 个小时来为我们的社区带来改变，我们继续努力通过对全球青年服务运动 Generation On 和青年企业 Points 的创始支持，激励年轻人在世界上留下自己的印记光的。我们在社区中所做的努力是全球孩之宝员工为参与其中而感到自豪的事情。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For Hasbro, CSR is a journey of innovation and continuous improvement. We invite you to learn more about our efforts at www.hasbro.com/csr.
annotations.translation: 对于孩之宝来说，企业社会责任是一个创新和持续改进的旅程。我们邀请您进一步了解我们在 www.hasbro.com/csr 所做的努力。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Today, our global Hasbro teams are focused on the core tenants of our branded play strategy: creating the most innovative play experiences in the industry, inventing new brands, keeping momentum in our international businesses, and regaining it in the U.S. and Canada, and delivering new immersive brand experiences for our consumers.
annotations.translation: 今天，我们的全球孩之宝团队专注于我们品牌游戏战略的核心租户：创造业内最具创新性的游戏体验，发明新品牌，保持我们国际业务的势头，并在美国和加拿大重新获得它，并为我们的消费者提供新的沉浸式品牌体验。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We are committed to returning our U.S. and Canada segment to historical levels of performance and transforming our traditional games business into a globally expansive Hasbro gaming enterprise.
annotations.translation: 我们致力于使我们的美国和加拿大分部的业绩恢复到历史水平，并将我们的传统游戏业务转变为一个全球扩张的孩之宝游戏企业。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We have invested in the infrastructure to move from global aspirations to global execution and are positioned to capitalize on the innovation in our brands all around the world.
annotations.translation: 我们对基础设施进行了投资，以从全球抱负转向全球执行，并有能力利用我们在世界各地品牌的创新。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We are committed to our branded play strategy and believe it is working, but we recognize there are areas where we need to improve our execution. We value your continued support and participation along this journey as we strive to unlock greater potential from our Hasbro brands globally and share that success with you, our fellow shareholders.
annotations.translation: 我们致力于我们的品牌游戏战略，并相信其是有效的，但我们认识到在某些领域我们需要改进我们的执行。我们非常重视您在此旅程中的持续支持和参与，因为我们努力在全球释放孩之宝品牌的更大潜力，并与您，我们的股东同仁，分享我们的成功。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Alfred J. Verrecchia
